TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ECDiffieHellman extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class ECDiffieHellman Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 提供一个抽象基类，可以从它派生椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法实现。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class that Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm implementations can derive from.

summary.span: 此类提供一个所有 ECDH 实现都必须支持的基本操作集。

span.span: This class provides the basic set of operations that all ECDH implementations must support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用作 ECDH 实现的抽象基类。This class serves as the abstract base class for ECDH implementations.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ECDiffieHellman ();

Protected Sub New ()
protected: ECDiffieHellman();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由派生自 类的类调用。This constructor is called by classes that derive from the class. 类是当前包含在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]中的唯一实现。The class is the only implementation that is currently included in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关如何创建新的椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman （ECDH）算法的实现的信息，请参阅 方法。For information about how to create a new implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm, see the method.

summary.span: 创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法的实现的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of an implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

summary.span: 创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法的默认实现的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

returns.span: 此类的默认实现的一个新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the default implementation of this class.

param.name: curve
param.span: 用于生成新公钥/私钥对的曲线。

span.span: The curve to use to generate a new public/private key-pair.

summary.span: 使用通过指定曲线生成的新公钥/私钥对，创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法的默认实现的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm with a new public/private key-pair generated over the specified curve.

returns.span: 椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 算法的默认实现的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 曲线必须验证（即，在传递给 方法时，它必须返回 true。curve must validate (that is, it must return true when passed to the method. 在 Windows 上不支持特性2曲线。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

span.span: does not validate.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman Create (System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters parameters);

Public Shared Function Create (parameters As ECParameters) As ECDiffieHellman

static member Create : System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters -> System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman

param.name: parameters
param.span: 椭圆曲线加密 (ECC) 算法的参数。

span.span: The parameters for the elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) algorithm.

summary.span: 创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法的默认实现的新实例，密钥由指定的 对象描述。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm with the key described by the specified object.

returns.span: 椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 算法的默认实现的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the default implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递到 方法时，必须验证 `parameters` （即，必须返回 `true`）。`parameters` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method. 不支持隐式曲线上的参数。Parameters over implicit curves are not supported. 在 Windows 上不支持特性2曲线。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

span.span: does not validate.

param.name: algorithm
param.span: ECDH 算法的实现的名称。

span.span: The name of an implementation of the ECDH algorithm.

summary.span: 创建椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 算法的特定实现的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

returns.span: 此类的指定实现的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the specified implementation of this class.

returns.span: 如果指定的算法名称未映射到 ECDH 实现，此方法将返回 。

span.span: If the specified algorithm name does not map to an ECDH implementation, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您开发自己的 对象实现，则可以使用 方法重载来创建指定您的实现的自定义 `algorithm` 字符串。If you develop your own implementation of an object, you can use the method overload to create a custom `algorithm` string that specifies your implementation. `algorithm` 参数指定 ECDH 算法的实现的名称。The `algorithm` parameter specifies the name of an implementation of the ECDH algorithm. 以下字符串指的是同一个实现，它是当前 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中支持的唯一实现。The following strings all refer to the same implementation, which is the only implementation currently supported in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]: - "ECDH""ECDH" - ECDiffieHellman"ECDiffieHellman" - ECDiffieHellmanCng"ECDiffieHellmanCng" - "System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng""System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng" 还可以为 `algorithm` 参数提供自定义 ECDH 实现的名称。You can also provide the name of a custom ECDH implementation for the `algorithm` parameter. 如果这样做， 对象将使用它来确定是否可以创建 ECDH 对象。If you do that, the object will use it to determine whether an ECDH object can be created.

span.span: The parameter is .

summary.span: 使用哈希函数派生可用作密钥的字节。

span.span: Derives bytes that can be used as a key using a hash function .

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, generates a new ephemeral public/private key pair for the specified curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `curve` 必须在传递到 方法时验证（即必须返回 `true`），且不能是隐式的。`curve` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method) and must not be implicit. 在 Windows 上不支持特性2曲线。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只支持 ECPrivateKey 的二进制（BER/CER/DER）编码。This method only supports the binary (BER/CER/DER) encoding of ECPrivateKey. 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式，则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。If the value is Base64-encoded or in the PEM text format, the caller must Base64-decode the contents before calling this method.

span.span: When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes read from .

param.span: 该参数未经初始化即被处理。

span.span: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

summary.span: 使用基于字节的密码解密之后，从 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 结构中导入公/私钥对，以替换此对象的密钥。

span.span: Imports the public/private keypair from a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure after decrypting with a byte-based password, replacing the keys for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密码字节直接传递到由 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 内容指示的算法使用的密钥派生函数（KDF）。The password bytes are passed directly into the Key Derivation Function (KDF) used by the algorithm indicated by the EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo contents. 这样，就可以与使用 PBKDF2 （基于密码的密钥派生函数2）处理密码时使用 UTF-8 以外文本编码的其他系统兼容。This enables compatibility with other systems which use a text encoding other than UTF-8 when processing passwords with PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2). 此方法只支持 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 的二进制（BER/CER/DER）编码。This method only supports the binary (BER/CER/DER) encoding of EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo. 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式，则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。If the value is Base64-encoded or in the PEM text format, the caller must Base64-decode the contents before calling this method.

span.span: The password is incorrect.
-or-

exception.span: 的内容表示要应用的密钥派生功能 (KDF) 是旧的 PKCS#12 KDF，需要基于 的密码。

span.span: The contents of indicate the Key Derivation Function (KDF) to apply is the legacy PKCS#12 KDF, which requires -based passwords.
-or-

exception.span: 的内容不表示 ASN.1-BER 编码的 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 结构。

span.span: The contents of do not represent an ASN.1-BER-encoded PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure.
-or-

exception.span: 的内容指示密钥用于此实例表示的算法以外的算法。

span.span: The contents of indicate the key is for an algorithm other than the algorithm represented by this instance.
-or-

exception.span: 的内容表示密钥采用的格式不受支持。

span.span: The contents of represent the key in a format that is not supported.
-or-

exception.span: 特定于算法的密钥导入失败。

span.span: The algorithm-specific key import failed.

summary.span: 使用基于字符的密码解密之后，从 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 结构中导入公/私钥对，以替换此对象的密钥。

span.span: Imports the public/private keypair from a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure after decrypting with a char-based password, replacing the keys for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `source` 的内容指示使用 PBKDF1 （基于密码的密钥派生函数1）或 PBKDF2 （基于密码的密钥派生函数2）的算法时，密码将通过 UTF-8 编码转换为字节。When the contents of `source` indicate an algorithm that uses PBKDF1 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 1) or PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2), the password is converted to bytes via the UTF-8 encoding. 此方法只支持 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 的二进制（BER/CER/DER）编码。This method only supports the binary (BER/CER/DER) encoding of EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo. 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式，则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。If the value is Base64-encoded or in the PEM text format, the caller must Base64-decode the contents before calling this method.

span.span: The password is incorrect.
-or-

exception.span: 的内容不表示 ASN.1-BER 编码的 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 结构。

span.span: The contents of do not represent an ASN.1-BER-encoded PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure.
-or-

span.span: The contents of indicate the key is for an algorithm other than the algorithm represented by this instance.
-or-

span.span: The contents of represent the key in a format that is not supported.
-or-

exception.span: 特定于算法的密钥导入失败。

span.span: The algorithm-specific key import failed.

summary.span: 尝试使用基于字符的密码以 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 格式将当前密钥导入所提供的缓冲区。

span.span: Attempts to export the current key in the PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo format into a provided buffer, using a char-based password.

returns.span: 如果 具有足够的大小以接收输出，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is big enough to receive the output; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `pbeParameters` 指示使用 PBKDF2 （基于密码的密钥派生函数2）的算法，则密码将通过 UTF-8 编码转换为字节。When `pbeParameters` indicates an algorithm that uses PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2), the password is converted to bytes via the UTF-8 encoding.

span.span: The key could not be exported.
